title: Superdensity with respect to Radon measure on ${\mathbf R}^n$
abstract:
We introduce and investigate superdensity and the density degree of sets with
respect to a Radon measure on ${\mathbf R}^n$. Some applications are provided.
In particular we prove a result on the approximability of a set by closed
subsets of small density degree and a generalization of Schwarz's theorem on
cross derivatives.
